name: Mihindicta
description:
BEFORE DOWNLOADING!

This game was originally made using PowerPoint 2019!

It is Highly Recommended to download the PowerPoint Version (Mihindicta v0.1 PPT) if you own PowerPoint 2010 or above.

Only download the Executable Version (Mihindicta v0.1 EXE) if you don't own PowerPoint 2010 or above, or PowerPoint in General. (Additional files may need to be installed)

Google Slides, WPA Office, and Keynote will NOT work!

WELCOME!

Welcome to the state of Mihindicta! A choose-your-own-adventure style story game where you assume the role of Robert Jackson!

This game is a submission for the Untitled Game Jam #33!

System Requirements (Recommended):

== OS == Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10

== Processor == 2.66Ghz Core 2 Duo or Greater

== Memory == 4 GB RAM

== Graphics == Any Intel HD Integrated Graphics or Better

== Storage == 300 MB (PPT version) / 250 - 400 MB (exe version)

Update Log v1.0 (EXE):

  • Made some compromises for the EXE version of the game to squish bugs.
  • EXE version is now 100 MB Lighter!
